# PassFields.SecondaryFields

**Object**

An object that represents the fields that display supporting information on the front of a pass.

## Declaration

```swift
object PassFields.SecondaryFields
```

## Adding content to the front of a pass

- **PassFields.PrimaryFields**: An object that represents the fields that display the most important information on the front of a pass.
- **PassFields.AuxiliaryFields**: An object that represents the fields that display additional information on the front of a pass.
- **PassFields.HeaderFields**: An object that represents the fields that display information at the top of a pass.

## Inherits From

- PassFieldContent
